channel.title: [PI] Shop Problem

item.title: [PI] Shop Problem
item.dc:creator: @DonWorld DonWorld
item.description:
@DonWorld wrote:

Hey guys I added some new slayer interface and theres like a small box misssing in all my shops. I thought it was setChildren(7, Interface);
which they both share so I changed one to a different number and it didnt work so I did some other stuff and nothing happenedâ€¦ So can anybody help please?

My shops interface:

public static void editShopMain(RSFont[] TDA) { RSInterface Interface = addInterface(3824); setChildren(8, Interface); addSprite(3825, 0, "Sprites/Interfaces/ShopTab/SHOP"); addHover(3902, 3, 0, 3826, 1, "Sprites/Interfaces/Bank/BANK", 17, 17, "Close Window"); addHovered(3826, 2, "Sprites/Interfaces/Bank/BANK", 17, 17, 3827); addText(19679, "Main Stock", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52,TDA, 1); addText(19680, "Player Stock", 0xBF751D, false, true, 52,TDA, 1); AddInterfaceButton(19681, 1, "Sprites/Interfaces/ShopTab/SHOP", 95, 19, "Player Stock", 1); setBounds(3825, 12, 12, 0, Interface); setBounds(3902, 471, 22, 1, Interface); setBounds(3826, 471, 22, 2, Interface); setBounds(3900, 60, 85, 3, Interface); setBounds(3901, 240, 21, 4, Interface); setBounds(19679, 42, 54, 5, Interface); setBounds(19680, 150, 54, 6, Interface); setBounds(19681, 129, 50, 7, Interface); Interface = interfaceCache[3900]; Interface.invSpritePadX = 8; Interface.width = 10; Interface.height = 4; Interface = addInterface(19682); addSprite(19683, 1, "Interfaces/ShopTab/SHOP"); addText(19684, "Main Stock", 0xBF751D, false, true, 52,TDA, 1); addText(19685, "Store Info", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52,TDA, 1); AddInterfaceButton(19686, 2, "Interfaces/ShopTab/SHOP", 95, 19, "Main Stock", 1); setChildren(7, Interface); setBounds(19683, 12, 12, 0, Interface); setBounds(3901, 240, 21, 1, Interface); setBounds(19684, 42, 54, 2, Interface); setBounds(19685, 150, 54, 3, Interface); setBounds(19686, 23, 50, 4, Interface); setBounds(3902, 471, 22, 5, Interface); setBounds(3826, 60, 85, 6, Interface); }
